body:
On 2014-01-21 01:14:05 +0000, Rob Guglielmetti said:


Debian Wheezy is the current "stable" release.  It was released just
last December and contains glibc 2.13.  So, off the top of my head--and
Bernd might have a different opinion--I would say that if possible it
would probably be best to make the binaries work with the stable
version of Debian.

Randolph



--
Randolph M. Fritz
subject: [Radiance-general] Regarding Radiance Installation, Qt-based rvu,and Objline issues
